dimensions.name: Intensity
dimensions.description: Representation of the pulse return magnitude

dimensions.name: Amplitude
dimensions.description: This is the ratio of the received power to the power received at the detection limit expressed in dB

dimensions.name: Reflectance
dimensions.description: Ratio of the received power to the power that would be received from a white diffuse target at the same distance expressed in dB. The reflectance represents a range independent property of the target.  The surface normal of this target is assumed to be in parallel to the laser beam direction.

dimensions.name: ReturnNumber
dimensions.description: Pulse return number for a given output pulse. A given output laser pulse can have many returns, and they must be marked in order, starting with 1

dimensions.name: NumberOfReturns
dimensions.description: Total number of returns for a given pulse.

dimensions.name: ScanDirectionFlag
dimensions.description: Direction at which the scanner mirror was traveling at the time of the output pulse. A value of 1 is a positive scan direction, and a bit value of 0 is a negative scan direction, where positive scan direction is a scan moving from the left side of the in-track direction to the right side and negative the opposite

dimensions.name: EdgeOfFlightLine
dimensions.description: Indicates the end of scanline before a direction change with a value of 1 - 0 otherwise

dimensions.name: Classification
dimensions.description: ASPRS classification.  0 for no classification.  See LAS specification for details.

dimensions.name: ScanAngleRank
dimensions.description: Angle degree at which the laser point was output from the system, including the roll of the aircraft.  The scan angle is based on being nadir, and -90 the left side of the aircraft in the direction of flight

dimensions.name: PointSourceId
dimensions.description: File source ID from which the point originated.  Zero indicates that the point originated in the current file

dimensions.name: GpsTime
dimensions.description: GPS time that the point was acquired

dimensions.name: InternalTime
dimensions.description: Scanner's internal time when the point was acquired, in seconds

dimensions.name: IsPpsLocked
dimensions.description: The external PPS signal was found to be synchronized at the time of the current laser shot.

dimensions.name: Deviation
dimensions.description: A larger value for deviation indicates larger distortion.

dimensions.name: PointId
dimensions.description: An explicit representation of point ordering within a file, which allows this usually-implicit information to be preserved when reordering points.

dimensions.name: OriginId
dimensions.description: A file source ID from which the point originated.  This ID is global to a derivative dataset which may be aggregated from multiple files.

dimensions.name: NormalX
dimensions.description: X component of a vector normal to surface at this point

dimensions.name: NormalY
dimensions.description: Y component of a vector normal to surface at this point

dimensions.name: NormalZ
dimensions.description: Z component of a vector normal to surface at this point

dimensions.name: Curvature
dimensions.description: Curvature of surface at this point

dimensions.name: Omit
dimensions.description: Used to shallowly mark a point as being omitted without removing it

dimensions.name: ClusterID
dimensions.description: ID assigned to a point by a point-clustering algorithm.

dimensions.name: NNDistance
dimensions.description: Distance metric related to a point's nearest neighbors.
